name: TLY Link Shortener
title: TLY Link Shortener

api_list.name: Stats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tly-link-shortener.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/link/stats?short_url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.ly%2FOYXL&api_token=xxxxxxxxx"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tly-link-shortener.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://tly-link-shortener.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/link/stats?short_url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.ly%2FOYXL&api_token=xxxxxxxxx"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tly-link-shortener.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
